column1: Trisha Pollard believes the Texas social services system relies too much on the courts to police Medicaid fraud and not enough on a tool placed in its hands nearly nine years ago: criminal background checks. column1: TOKYO (AFP) - Nearly half of Tokyo's residents could not name a single Paralympian and international sporting officials are worried about the city's readiness to accommodate athletes. As the 2020 Games approaches, the Japanese capital has work to do. "If the Paralympics is not a success, the Tokyo Games are not a success," Tokyo Governor Yuriko Koike told Agence France-Presse in a recent interview. So with an eye to filling stadiums, Tokyo has embarked on an overhaul of its infrastructure, making its subway system disabled-friendly and reaching out to hotels to check on their ease of access for wheelchair users.|1

column1: New research suggests mice with induced Alzheimer ’ s-like symptoms had improved cognitive function when given a synthetic estrogen-like hormone. The findings of this study are interesting as they go against the grain of what has been considered to be an established body of evidence. It is widely accepted that hormone replacement therapy can cause negative side effects
column2: such as heart disease and stroke.|0

Northern Ireland was today branded the race hate capital of Europe , in a report on racist violence in the province. "The report says that while racism is on the rise across the UK , the figures for the province have been "staggering." Racist attacks increased in the province by 700% in the past decade, according to the report from the Runnymede Trust, a leading race equality think tank in the UK. While attacks in England and Wales almost doubled, the number of racist offences reported to police in Northern Ireland increased from 113 in 1997/98 to 784 in 2002/03.|0

column4: hexacopters
column5: octocopters
column6: etc)
column7: and those of the winged variety. Both categories have their own set of advantages and disadvantages. Multi-rotor aircraft are typically more stable and easy to fly
column8: but also much slower than wing drones that focus on forward acceleration. Conversely
column9: winged drones can fly faster and further than their hovering counterparts

column1: For small businesses that sell on credit
column2: accounts receivable can make up a substantial portion of the balance sheet. During the annual audit
column3: auditors will check to see if your claims regarding the accounts receivable balance can be proved. These claims are known as assertions. The most common audit procedure related to accounts receivable is confirmation
column4: in which the auditor will ask your customers to confirm their account balance. Suriname is a small South American country on the Atlantic Ocean. It lies between Guyana and French Guiana and is one of the smallest nations in South America. It has 570,000 inhabitants. The city reported 136 opioid overdoses last year and 105 so far this year. “I believe it’s because of the work of the people that work in the Delray Beach Fire-Rescue department and the people we’ve trained,” said Fire-Rescue Chief Jeff Kocek. “We have Narcan out there every day and our people recognize the signs.”
Last year, the city launched an emergency room pilot program at Bethesda Health Hospital to treat those suffering from an overdose in hopes of keeping them from going back to using.|0
